name: Gimme Shelter
summary_text: A pregnant teenager flees her abusive mother in search of her father, only to be rejected by her stepmother and forced to survive on the streets until a compassionate stranger offers a hopeful alternative.

name: Paradise Lost 2: Revelations
summary_text: The case of the West Memphis Three, its questionable circumstances and the parties involved are followed up years later.

name: Swiped
summary_text: James, a college freshman and computer genius, is enlisted by his womanizing roommate, Lance, to code the ultimate hook-up app. But when James discovers that his divorced mother is using the app, unexpected consequences ensue.

name: The Future
summary_text: When a couple decides to adopt a stray cat their perspective on life changes radically, literally altering the course of time and space and testing their faith in each other and themselves.

name: The Atticus Institute
summary_text: The story of a 1970's psychology lab in Pennsylvania where a case of demonic possession took place.

name: Blackboard Jungle
summary_text: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
summary_text: Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that turns him into the evil Mr. Hyde.

name: Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes
summary_text: With Maltazard now seven feet tall and Arthur still two inches small, our hero must find a way to grow back to his normal size and stop the Evil M once and for all, with the help of Selenia and Betameche.

name: Beat the Devil
summary_text: On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there, and a seemingly innocent British couple. They meet and things happen...

name: Koyla
summary_text: A village girl agrees to a marriage to a king she has never met after he sends her a photograph of himself. But the man in the photograph is not the king but his most loyal slave, the handsome but mute Shankar.

name: Bhootnath
summary_text: Moving into a new house, a family witnesses an unfriendly ghost who wants to drive them away from the house. However, he befriends a little boy who changes his outlook forever.

name: Journey's End
summary_text: Set in a dugout in Aisne in 1918, it is the story of a group of British officers, led by the mentally disintegrating young officer Stanhope, as they await their fate.

name: Dodsworth
summary_text: A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a long-planned European vacation only to find that they want very different things from life.

name: Booty Call
summary_text: Two friends who have gone too long without sex set out to get some.

name: Yi ge dou bu neng shao
summary_text: In a remote mountain village, the teacher must leave for a month, and the mayor can find only a 13-year old girl, Wei Minzhi, to substitute. The teacher leaves one stick of chalk for each ...                See full summary »

name: Petta
summary_text: A hostel warden becomes the target of a dreaded politician and his gangster son, but little do they realize that it is they who should fear him.

name: Pope Joan
summary_text: A woman of English extraction born in the German city of Ingelheim in the ninth century disguises herself as a man and rises through the Vatican ranks.

name: The Buddy Holly Story
summary_text: The story of the life and career of the early rock and roll singer, from his meteoric rise to stardom, to his marriage and untimely death.

name: Rudo y Cursi
summary_text: Two siblings rival each other inside the world of professional soccer.

name: Bunny Lake Is Missing
summary_text: A woman reports that her young daughter is missing, but there seems to be no evidence that she ever existed.

name: Ghoulies
summary_text: A young man and his girlfriend move into an old mansion home, where he becomes possessed by a desire to control ancient demons.

name: The God of Cookery
summary_text: The most renowned and feared chef in the world loses his title of God of Cookery because of his pompous attitude. Humbled, he sets out to reclaim his title.

name: Father of Invention
summary_text: After 8 years in prison, inventor Robert Axle struggles to win over his estranged family and catch up on current technology as he works to once again become the king of the infomercial.

name: Demon Seed
summary_text: A scientist creates Proteus--an organic super computer with artificial intelligence which becomes obsessed with human beings, and in particular the creators wife.

name: Here on Earth
summary_text: A rich college kid is taught a lesson after a joy ride ends up destroying a country restaurant.

name: American Me
summary_text: A Mexican-American Mafia kingpin is released from prison, falls in love for the first time, and grows introspective about his gangster lifestyle.

name: The Front
summary_text: In 1953, a cashier poses as a writer for blacklisted talents to submit their work through, but the injustice around him pushes him to take a stand.

name: Khaleja
summary_text: When a mysterious illness ravages a remote village, the villagers embrace a reluctant taxi driver as their savior.

name: Trick
summary_text: The misadventures of two young gay men, trying to find a place to be alone, one night in Manhattan.

name: The Funeral
summary_text: After the funeral of one of their own, a criminal family decides to embark on an emotionally unnerving journey in an attempt to exact bloody revenge.

name: The Mouse That Roared
summary_text: An impoverished backward nation declares a war on the United States of America, hoping to lose, but things don't go according to plan.

name: Atlantics
summary_text: In a popular suburb of Dakar, workers on the construction site of a futuristic tower, without pay for months, decide to leave the country by the ocean for a better future. Among them is Souleiman, the lover of Ada, promised to another.

name: Mi nismo andjeli
summary_text: Angel and the devil fight for the soul of a Belgrade playboy who made a young girl pregnant.

name: Tre uomini e una gamba
summary_text: Three friends cross Italy by car in order to deliver their boss his dog and a wooden leg.

name: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
summary_text: A space alien is threatening to bring destruction on Earth, and the Power Rangers are enhanced with turbo powers in order to prevent his plan.

name: Ab Tak Chhappan
summary_text: An honest encounter specialist's life begins to change with the arrival of a new police commissioner who has ties with a local don.

name: Golmaal Again
summary_text: The gang encounters with some spiritual bodies and finds out the truth about the Jamnadas Orphanage where they were brought up.

name: Shakuntala Devi
summary_text: Shakuntala Devi, a mathematician's journey to become 'The Human Computer' and her relationship with her daughter.

name: The United States vs. Billie Holiday
summary_text: Follows Holiday during her career as she is targeted by the Federal Department of Narcotics with an undercover sting operation led by black Federal Agent Jimmy Fletcher, with whom she had a tumultuous affair.

name: Female Trouble
summary_text: A spoiled schoolgirl runs away from home, gets pregnant while hitch-hiking, and ends up as a fashion model for a pair of beauticians who like to photograph women committing crimes.

name: Bol Bachchan
summary_text: All hell breaks loose when a Muslim man breaks a temple lock to save a little child, thus for his safety keeps a Hindu name, where he starts making web of lies.

name: Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie
summary_text: Based on the legendary video game series. This anime classic follows Ryu, a talented fighter who may be the greatest in all of the world, and Bison, the evil mastermind searching for Ryu's talents.

name: Mac & Devin Go to High School
summary_text: A comedy that follows two high school students -- one overachiever struggling to write his valedictorian speech, the other a senior now going on his 15th year of school.

name: John Doe: Vigilante
summary_text: An ordinary man fights violence the only way he knows how - by killing one criminal at a time. Hero or villain? Justice or vengeance? You decide.

name: Siworae
summary_text: In 1999, a voice actor moves from Il Mare, a seaside house, and she leaves a Xmas card in its (magical) mailbox. He, an architect student, receives it in 1997, and so begins a friendship separated by 2 years.

name: Colossus: The Forbin Project
summary_text: Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.

name: Ivanhoe
summary_text: A knight seeks to free the captive King Richard and put him back on the throne.

name: The General
summary_text: The real-life story of Dublin folk hero and criminal Martin Cahill, who pulled off two daring robberies in Ireland with his team, but attracted unwanted attention from the police, the I.R.A., the U.V.F., and members of his own team.

name: Ryde
summary_text: Technology brings us closer. Or perhaps it brings strangers, a little too close. But how much can you really trust someone? With a new ride share service, you never know who you'll be getting in a car with. Or if you'll ever get out.

name: La chèvre
summary_text: A daughter of a millionaire, distinguish by incredible bad luck, goes missing. The idea how to find her is either insane or brilliant - to send after her an equally unlucky person.

name: Karakomik Filmler: Kaçamak
summary_text: Karakomik Films consists of two different films called Kaçamak and 2 Arada. The adventures of the four friends who are on vacation together in Kaçamak are the subject of the story.

name: People Places Things
summary_text: Will Henry is a newly single graphic novelist balancing parenting his young twin daughters and a classroom full of students while exploring and navigating the rich complexities of new love and letting go of the woman who left him.

name: Kids in the Hall: Brain Candy
summary_text: A pharmaceutical scientist creates a pill that makes people remember their happiest memory, and although it's successful, it has unfortunate side effects.

name: Approaching the Unknown
summary_text: A U.S. astronaut prepares for a mission to Mars.

name: Enes Batur Gerçek Kahraman
summary_text: Enes Batur becomes a part of "Justice Warriors" and embarks upon an adventure which will eventually make him a superhero.

name: The Girl in the Café
summary_text: Lawrence, an aging, lonely civil servant falls for Gina, an enigmatic young woman. When he takes her to the G8 Summit in Reykjavik, however, their bond is tested by Lawrence's professional obligations.

name: Red Hill
summary_text: A young police officer must survive his first day's duty in a small country town.

name: Battle Beyond the Stars
summary_text: A young farmer sets out to recruit mercenaries to defend his peaceful planet, which is under threat of invasion by the evil tyrant Sador and his armada of aggressors.

name: Cop & ½
summary_text: After witnessing a murder, a young boy named Devon refuses to testify unless he is given the chance to be a policeman.

name: Odds and Evens
summary_text: The navy's detective gets his brother, the ex-gambler to help him liquidate an illegal gaming house on a yacht near Miami.

name: Dot the I
summary_text: Young lovers in London are wrapped up in a love triangle that may not be exactly what it seems.

name: I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell
summary_text: A guy tries to patch things up with his soon-to-be-married pal after botching things up at his bachelor party.

name: Secuestro
summary_text: When her boy's alleged kidnapper is released for lack of solid evidence, a reputable and well-known attorney takes matters into her own hands with unintended and spectacularly disastrous consequences.

name: The Man from Earth: Holocene
summary_text: A 14,000-year-old college professor notices that he has finally started showing signs of aging. Meanwhile, four of his students get suspicious of him and start investigating his past.

name: A Man Called Horse
summary_text: In 1825, an English aristocrat is captured by Native Americans. He lives with them and begins to understand their way of life. Eventually, he is accepted as part of the tribe and aspires to become their leader.

name: A Brighter Summer Day
summary_text: Based on a true story, primarily on a conflict between two youth gangs, a 14-year-old boy's girlfriend conflicts with the head of one gang for an unclear reason, until finally the conflict comes to a violent climax.

name: Repossessed
summary_text: Parody of The Exorcist (1973), with Linda Blair once again possessed by Satan, and Leslie Nielsen as the exorcist.

name: Heropanti
summary_text: Two young people find love despite the violent landscape in which they live.

name: The Good Night
summary_text: A former pop star who now writes commercial jingles for a living, experiences a mid-life crisis.

name: I Hate Valentine's Day
summary_text: A florist, who abides by a strict five-date-limit with any man, finds herself wanting more with the new restaurateur in town.

name: Stander
summary_text: The life and career of Andre Stander, a South African police officer turned bank robber.

name: Branded to Kill
summary_text: After a badly done assignment, a hitman finds himself in conflict with his organisation, and one mysterious and dangerous fellow-hitman in particular.

name: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow
summary_text: Stories about three very different women and the men they attract.

name: Lonely Are the Brave
summary_text: A fiercely independent cowboy gets himself locked up in prison to escape with an old friend.

name: Extra Ordinary
summary_text: Rose, a mostly sweet and lonely Irish driving instructor, must use her supernatural talents to save the daughter of Martin (also mostly sweet and lonely) from a washed-up rock star who is using her in a Satanic pact to reignite his fame.

name: The After
summary_text: Eight strangers are thrown together by mysterious forces and must help each other survive in a violent world that defies explanation.

name: Drowning by Numbers
summary_text: Three generations of women all share the same problem: marriage woes, and they want to put an end to it.

name: In Love and War
summary_text: A bitter love story between a talented writer and a gentle nurse.

name: Sparks
summary_text: A masked vigilante who discovers the dark side to heroism. Going after the nation's most notorious super criminal leaves Sparks' life and reputation in ruins.

name: Visaaranai
summary_text: Four labourers are tortured by the police to confess to a theft they have not committed.

name: The Yellow Handkerchief
summary_text: A road trip through Louisiana transforms three strangers who were originally brought together by their respective feelings of loneliness.

name: Cargo 200
summary_text: A young woman is taken hostage by a police officer gone mad.

name: Yennai Arindhaal
summary_text: Sathyadev, a sincere police officer, tries to stop an organ trafficking racket. But he is unaware that the man performing the illegal trade is the same person who killed his beloved.

name: The Singing Detective
summary_text: From his hospital bed, a writer suffering from a skin disease hallucinates musical numbers and paranoid plots.

name: Winter Passing
summary_text: An editor offers Reese (actress/bartender) $100,000 for her recently dead mom's letters from her novelist dad. She heads home from NYC to get them. Her dad lives in the garage while two strangers live in the house.
A story of how obsession, addiction and abuse cause a young woman to execute an elaborate plan of revenge.

name: American Ninja 2: The Confrontation
summary_text: On a remote Caribbean island, Army Ranger Joe Armstrong investigates the disappearance of several marines, which leads him to The Lion, a super-criminal who has kidnapped a local scientist and mass-produced an army of mutant Ninja warriors.

name: Pyewacket
summary_text: A frustrated, angst-ridden teenage girl awakens something in the woods when she naively performs an occult ritual to evoke a witch to kill her mother.

name: Accident Man
summary_text: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

name: The Swimming Pool
summary_text: Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.

name: Indiscreet
summary_text: An actress who has given up on love meets a suave banker and begins a flirtation with him...even though he's already married.

name: Türkisch für Anfänger
summary_text: After a plane crash Lena Schneider finds herself on a remote Andaman island with a teenage turk Cem, full of hormones, his religious sister and Greek Costa.

name: The Craft: Legacy
summary_text: A group of high school students form a coven of witches.

name: Patient Zero
summary_text: After an unprecedented global pandemic turns the majority of humankind into violent "Infected," a man gifted with the ability to speak the Infected's new language leads the last survivors on a hunt for Patient Zero and a cure.

name: The Resistance Banker
summary_text: In Nazi-occupied Amsterdam, banker brothers Walraven and Gijs van Hall face their greatest challenge yet when they decide to help fund the Dutch resistance.

name: The Sleeping Dictionary
summary_text: A young Englishman is sent to Malaysian Borneo in the 1930s to stay with a tribe as UK's colonial representative. A local woman (J.Alba) helps him understand local tradition and language. He falls in love with her etc. despite the taboo.

name: Cabin Boy
summary_text: A foul-mouthed finishing school graduate mistakenly winds up on an ill-fated fishing boat and faces the wrath of a crew that considers him bad luck.

name: Doom: Annihilation
summary_text: A group of UAC Marines respond to a distress call from a top secret scientific base on Phobos, a moon around Mars, only to discover it's been overrun by demons who seek to create Hell on Earth.

name: Treto poluvreme
summary_text: Determined to build the best football club in the country, Dimitry hires the German coach, Rudolph Spitz, to galvanize his rag tag team but - when the first Nazi tanks roll through the city and Rebecca, the beautiful daughter of a local banker, elopes with his star player, all Dimitry's plans must change.

name: The Devil Rides Out
summary_text: Devil worshipers plan to convert two new victims.

name: Farewell, My Queen
summary_text: A look at the platonic relationship between Marie Antoinette and one of her female readers during the first days of the French Revolution.

name: South Pacific
summary_text: On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.

name: Everyone's Hero
summary_text: A boy (Jake T. Austin) begins a grand journey to return Babe Ruth's baseball bat before the deciding game of the 1932 World Series comes to a close.

name: Angel of Mine
summary_text: A woman grieving over the death of her daughter loses grip of reality when she begins to think her girl may still be alive.

name: Narrow Margin
summary_text: A Los Angeles Deputy District Attorney is sent to protect a woman who accidentally witnessed a Mafia murder.

name: Numb
summary_text: A chronically depressed screenwriter desperately tries to cure his condition when he meets the girl of his dreams.

name: Cumali Ceber 2
summary_text: Cumali Ceber learns about the demolition of the nursing home in the neighborhood belonging to his grandfather while he is in the process of asking his eldest son Cevher for a girl and gives...                See full summary »

name: Call Northside 777
summary_text: Chicago reporter P.J. McNeal re-opens a decade-old murder case.

name: Hong gao liang
summary_text: When a leprous winery owner in 1930s China dies a few days after his arranged marriage, his young widow is forced to run the winery to make a living while contending with bandits, her drunkard lover, and the invading Japanese army.

name: Smokey and the Bandit Part 3
summary_text: Big and Little Enos are opening a sea food restaurant. They bet Sheriff Buford T. Justice that he cannot drive from Miami to the Enos ranch in Texas in a given amount of time. If Buford loses he has to give up his badge.

name: Honkytonk Man
summary_text: A boy with a music talent goes on a journey with his uncle for a stage concert.

name: Neds
summary_text: Encompassed by violent street gangs, neglectful parents, bullying teachers and a dearth of positive role models, a studious but emotionally abandoned kid turns thug.

name: Ed
summary_text: A trained chimpanzee plays third base for a minor-league baseball team.

name: Born to Be Blue
summary_text: A re-imagining of jazz legend Chet Baker's musical comeback in the late '60s.

name: Perdita Durango
summary_text: A psychotic criminal couple kidnaps a random teenage couple. The woman rapes the male captive, and lets him watch his lover being raped by the man. They then plan to sacrifice the couple.

name: Yeralti
summary_text: A man's life, thoughts, feelings and his very own darkness... Adapted from Dostoevsky's novel "Notes from Undergroud", Demirkubuz follows Muharrem as he gets himself invited to a party ...                See full summary »

name: El infierno
summary_text: El Benny is deported from the U.S. and returns home to a Mexico devastated by the drug wars. He too joins in, and starts climbing the hierarchy, finding a prosperous life, full of money, women, violence and fun.

name: An Autumn Afternoon
summary_text: An aging widower arranges a marriage for his only daughter.

name: The Man from Snowy River
summary_text: In 1880s Australia, after young Jim Craig's father dies, Jim takes a job at the Harrison cattle ranch, where he is forced to become a man.

name: Paper Heart
summary_text: Charlyne Yi embarks on a quest across America to make a documentary about the one subject she doesn't fully understand: Love.

name: Oh, Ramona!
summary_text: A teenager named Andrei transitions from a teenager into an adult.

name: The Catcher Was a Spy
summary_text: A former major league baseball player, Moe Berg, goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services.

name: Louis C.K.: Shameless
summary_text: Comedy and television star Louis C.K. returns to HBO for an hour of no-holds-barred, adults-only stand-up comedy taped before a live audience at the Henry Fonda Theater in Los Angeles.

name: The Russians Are Coming the Russians Are Coming
summary_text: Without hostile intent, a Soviet submarine runs aground off New England. Men are sent for a boat, but many villagers go into a tizzy, risking bloodshed.

name: Bat*21
summary_text: During the Vietnam War, Colonel Hambleton's aircraft is shot down over enemy territory and a frantic rescue operation ensues.

name: The Returned
summary_text: In a post-zombie world, where the infected live normal lives, their retroviral drug is running out.

name: London to Brighton
summary_text: Desperate to evade an angry pimp, a London prostitute and a young girl flee by train to Brighton after an appointment with a powerful client goes violently wrong.

name: The Scent of Green Papaya
summary_text: A Vietnamese servant girl, Mui, observes lives within two different Saigon families: the first, a woman textile seller with three boys and a frequently absent husband; the second, a handsome young pianist with his fiancée.

name: In Harm's Way
summary_text: A Naval officer, reprimanded after Pearl Harbor, is later promoted to Rear Admiral and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.

name: The Sorcerer and the White Snake
summary_text: A master monk tries to protect a naive young physician from a thousand-year-old snake demon. A contest of psychic powers results in mayhem.

name: Biyeolhan geori
summary_text: A small time thug collecting debts for the local triad is torn between his criminal aspirations and his devotion to family.

name: Der Wixxer
summary_text: A mysterious serial killer is shocking the underworld. Scotland Yard is investigating the case. Clues lead the detectives to Blackwhite Castle.

name: Peppermint Candy
summary_text: Consists of five phases of a man's life about why he committed suicide in the end.

name: House Arrest
summary_text: A group of children, desperate to keep their various parents from getting divorces, kidnap them and hold them prisoner in a basement in order to force them to reconcile.

name: The Shop on Main Street
summary_text: A carpenter in the Fascist Slovak State is appointed "Aryan controller" of a Jewish widow's store.

name: Pauline at the Beach
summary_text: Marion is about to divorce from her husband and takes her 15-year-old niece Pauline on a vacation to Granville. She meets an old love...

name: Home Fries
summary_text: Pregnant Sally unknowingly falls for the stepson of the deceased father of her baby and has to deal with his homicidal family.

name: Boulevard
summary_text: A devoted husband in a marriage of convenience is forced to confront his secret life.

name: Punchline
summary_text: A medical school dropout and a housewife/mom try to make it as stand-up comedians. They become friends and help each other out at an NYC comedy club.

name: Chimes at Midnight
summary_text: The career of Shakespeare's Sir John Falstaff as a roistering companion to young Prince Hal, circa 1400 to 1413.

name: The Osterman Weekend
summary_text: During the Cold War, a controversial television journalist is asked by the C.I.A. to persuade certain acquaintances, who are Soviet Agents of the Omega network, to defect.

name: The Glenn Miller Story
summary_text: Biography of bandleader Glenn Miller from his beginnings to his death over the English Channel in December 1944.

name: Bad Country
summary_text: In 1980s Louisiana a police detective arrests a contract killer. To be with his wife and newborn, he becomes an informant and assists in taking down the crime ring boss etc. FBI, blood and revenge follows.

name: Love Don't Cost a Thing
summary_text: A high school loser pays a cheerleader to pose as his girlfriend so he can be considered cool.

name: All About Lily Chou-Chou
summary_text: The problematic lives of teenager students for whom the singer Lily Chou-Chou's dreamy music is the only way to escape an alienating, violent and insensitive society.

name: Black Is King
summary_text: Visual album from Beyoncé inspired by 'The Lion King'.

name: I Know Where I'm Going!
summary_text: A young Englishwoman goes to the Hebrides to marry her older, wealthier fiancé. When the weather keeps them separated on different islands, she begins to have second thoughts.

name: Girl on the Third Floor
summary_text: Don Koch tries to renovate a rundown mansion with a sordid history for his growing family, only to learn that the house has other plans.

name: Wer
summary_text: A defense attorney begins to suspect that there might be more to her client, who is charged with the murders of a vacationing family, than meets the eye.

name: Easy Money
summary_text: To inherit his mother-in-law's colossal fortune, a hard-living gambling addict must change his unhealthy ways before they get the best of him.

name: Bairavaa
summary_text: Bairavaa, a gallant debt collector, takes on a violent criminal masquerading as a philanthropist in the education field.

name: Metro Manila
summary_text: This riveting crime thriller follows Oscar, a recent emigrant to Manila who gets pulled into a harrowing world of corruption and violence when he takes a job as an armored car driver to support his family (in Tagalog w/ English subtitles).

name: Out to Sea
summary_text: A failed gambler, intent on meeting a rich widow, tricks his widowed brother-in-law into boarding a cruise ship as dance hosts.

name: Invaders from Mars
summary_text: A boy tries to stop aliens who have taken over his town and are attempting to brainwash its inhabitants.

name: Jack Goes Boating
summary_text: A limo driver's blind date sparks a tale of love, betrayal, friendship, and grace centered around two working-class New York City couples.

name: I Think We're Alone Now
summary_text: The apocalypse proves a blessing in disguise for one lucky recluse -- until a second survivor arrives with the threat of companionship.

name: On My Skin: The Last Seven Days of Stefano Cucchi
summary_text: The incredible true story behind the most controversial Italian court cases in recent years. Stefano Cucchi was arrested for a minor crime but in just one week's time, a family is changed forever.

name: L'ultimo bacio
summary_text: Carlo's life is thrown into a tailspin when his longtime girlfriend Giulia announces she's pregnant. As Carlo faces up to his anxieties about adulthood, his buddies Paolo, Adriano and ...                See full summary »

name: Gang Related
summary_text: After murdering an undercover DEA agent, two corrupt cops scramble to cover up what they've done.

name: Duel in the Sun
summary_text: Beautiful, biracial, Pearl Chavez becomes the ward of her dead father's first love and finds herself torn between her sons, one good and the other bad.

name: Humanoids from the Deep
summary_text: A fisherman and a scientist fight back when mossy sea monsters assault women.

name: Shaitan
summary_text: Five substance-abusing friends decide to fake a kidnapping in order to bribe a police constable for covering-up a hit-and-run accident.

name: Sahara
summary_text: After the fall of Tobruk in 1942, during the Allied retreat in the Libyan desert, an American tank picks-up a motley group of survivors but they face advancing Germans and a lack of water.

name: Enas allos kosmos
summary_text: In modern Greece, while socioeconomic turmoil ravages Southern Europe, three distinct stories unfold, each representing a different generation of Greeks in love with a foreigner, each story coming together in the end to form a whole.

name: Ajnabee
summary_text: A newlywed couple, Raj and Priya, move to Switzerland and become friends with their new neighbors, Vicky and Sonia. But one day, Sonia is murdered and Raj is accused of the murder. He goes on the run in order to prove himself innocent.

name: Circle of Friends
summary_text: 3 women, who've been friends since childhood, meet at university in Dublin in 1957. Student and boyfriend life begins.

name: Jiang hu er nü
summary_text: A story of violent love within a time frame spanning from 2001 to 2017.

name: Salmer fra kjøkkenet
summary_text: A scientific observer's job of observing an old cantankerous single man's kitchen habits is complicated by his growing friendship with him.

name: Adult Beginners
summary_text: A bankrupt businessman tries to restore good relations with his sister and her family.

name: I'm for the Hippopotamus
summary_text: In Africa, 2 expat "brothers" are usually at each other's throats but now have a common enemy. Ormond's men are shooting or catching much of the wildlife for export as well as forcing the locals off their land. Lots of fun fights follow.

name: The Interview
summary_text: A duel between a suspected murderer and a detective pressed by people who want results. But whose skin is really wanted.

name: Shuddh Desi Romance
summary_text: A romantic comedy which tells the journey of three restless young people who junk society's syllabus for finding love and decide to follow their heart.

name: Mini's First Time
summary_text: A rebellious girl hooks up with an escort agency, where her stepfather is a client.

name: Double Take
summary_text: A man on the run takes another man's passport, only to find himself stuck with the identity of a street hustler.

name: Falcon Rising
summary_text: Chapman is an ex-marine in Brazil's slums, battling the yakuza outfit who attacked his sister and left her for dead.

name: The Cassandra Crossing
summary_text: Passengers on a European train have been exposed to a deadly disease. Nobody will let them off the train. So what happens next?

name: Supercondriaque
summary_text: Fanatical need for cleanliness of a raging hypochondriac is severe tested when he is mistaken for a war hero preparing for revolution.

name: The Last Tycoon
summary_text: F. Scott Fitzgerald's novel is brought to life in this story of a movie producer slowly working himself to death.

name: Acrimony
summary_text: A faithful wife, tired of standing by her devious husband, is enraged when it becomes clear she has been betrayed.

name: Rush
summary_text: Two small-town Texas cops go undercover to catch a major drug dealer and are sucked into the drug culture, compromising their assignment.

name: Ophelia
summary_text: A re-imagining of Hamlet, told from Ophelia's perspective.

name: Ideal Home
summary_text: A bickering gay couple must now deal with the unexpected task of raising a ten-year-old boy.

name: The Dance of Reality
summary_text: In a Chilean little town, the son of an uprooted couple, formed by a rigorous communist father and a loving but weak mother, tries to pave his own path in a society that does not understand their Jewish-Ukrainian origins.

name: Pirates
summary_text: The adventures of pirate Captain Red and his first mate Frog.

name: Glen or Glenda
summary_text: A psychiatrist tells the stories of a transvestite (Glen or Glenda) and a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).

name: Krisha
summary_text: Krisha returns for Thanksgiving dinner after ten years away from her family, but past demons threaten to ruin the festivities.

name: The Last Days
summary_text: 2013. A mysterious epidemic spreads across the planet; humanity develops an irrational fear of open spaces which causes death within seconds. Soon, the entire global populace is trapped ...                See full summary »

name: Mackenna's Gold
summary_text: A bandit kidnaps a Marshal who has seen a map showing a gold vein on Indian lands, but other groups are looking for it too, while the Apache try to keep the secret location undisturbed.

name: The Burrowers
summary_text: In the Wild West a rescue party sets out to find a family of settlers that has vanished from their home under mysterious circumstances.

name: Al-risâlah
summary_text: The story of prophet "Muhammad" and the delivery of the message of God "Allah."

name: Smetto quando voglio
summary_text: A university researcher is fired because of the cuts to university. To earn a living he decides to produce drugs recruiting his former colleagues, who despite their skills are living at the margins of society.

name: The Case for Christ
summary_text: An investigative journalist and self-proclaimed atheist sets out to disprove the existence of God after his wife becomes a Christian.

name: It's All About Love
summary_text: Two lovers attempt to save their relationship in a near-future world on the brink of cosmic collapse.

name: Sons of the Desert
summary_text: When Stan and Ollie trick their wives into thinking that they are taking a medicinal cruise while they're actually going to a convention, the wives find out the truth the hard way.

name: Other People's Money
summary_text: A corporate raider buys up shares in an undervalued company and falls in love with the founder's son's lawyer/step daughter. Let the battle begin.

name: Jaan-E-Mann: Let's Fall in Love... Again
summary_text: Follows a love triangle between Agastya, Suhaan and Piya.

name: Lost in America
summary_text: A husband and wife in their 30s decide to quit their jobs, live as free spirits and cruise America in a Winnebago.

name: Alien Abduction
summary_text: A vacationing family encounters an alien threat in this thriller based on the real-life Brown Mountain Lights phenomenon in North Carolina.

name: Child's Pose
summary_text: After the terrible news of a fatal car accident involving her son, a desperate mother will do anything in her power to set her child free.

name: Joyful Noise
summary_text: G.G. Sparrow faces off with her choir's newly appointed director, Vi Rose Hill, over the group's direction as they head into a national competition.

name: ABCs of Death 2
summary_text: Another 26-chapter anthology that showcases death in all its vicious wonder and brutal beauty.

name: The Anniversary Party
summary_text: Love is complex and relationships deteriorate.

name: We Summon the Darkness
summary_text: Three best friends embark on a road trip to a heavy-metal show, where they bond with three aspiring musicians and head off to one of the girls' country home for an after-party.

name: Reefer Madness
summary_text: Cautionary tale features a fictionalized take on the use of marijuana. A trio of drug dealers lead innocent teenagers to become addicted to "reefer" cigarettes by holding wild parties with jazz music.

name: Jane Eyre
summary_text: After a harsh childhood, orphan Jane Eyre is hired by Edward Rochester, the brooding lord of a mysterious manor house, to care for his young daughter.

name: Pygmalion
summary_text: A phonetics and diction expert makes a bet that he can teach a cockney flower girl to speak proper English and pass as a lady in high society.

name: The Pest
summary_text: A Miami con man agrees to be the human target for a Neo-Nazi manhunter in order to collect $50,000 if he survives.

name: Frankenstein's Army
summary_text: In the dying days of WWII, a battalion of Russian soldiers is lured into the secret lab of a deranged scientist and forced to face off against an army of horrific flesh-and-metal war machines.

name: A Walk on the Moon
summary_text: The world of a young housewife is turned upside down when she has an affair with a free-spirited blouse salesman.

name: Shenandoah
summary_text: During the Civil War, a Virginia farmer and his family vow to remain neutral, but one of the sons is captured by Union soldiers, sending the farmer to his rescue.

name: Dog Eat Dog
summary_text: A crew of ex-cons are hired by a Cleveland mafioso to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster.

name: Himmatwala
summary_text: When a temple priest commits suicide after being dishonored by an evil landlord, his son returns to his native village on a mission of vengeance.

name: The Alphabet Killer
summary_text: Based on the true story of the double initial killings in Rochester, NY.

name: Vision Quest
summary_text: A high school wrestler in Spokane, Washington has trouble focusing on his training regimen when a beautiful young drifter takes up temporary residence at his home.

name: Sleight
summary_text: A young street magician (Jacob Latimore) is left to care for his little sister after their parents' passing, and turns to illegal activities to keep a roof over their heads. When he gets in...                See full summary »

name: Lila & Eve
summary_text: Two distraught mothers, whose children were gunned down in a drive-by, team up to avenge their deaths after local authorities fail to take action.

name: Panic
summary_text: Alex, a hit man, tries to get out of the family business, but his father won't let him do so. While seeking the help of a therapist, he meets a sexually charged 23-year-old woman with whom he falls in love.

name: Mothra vs. Godzilla
summary_text: Mothra's egg washes ashore in Japan and is claimed by greedy entrepreneurs who refuse to return it to Infant Island. As Godzilla arises near Nagoya, the Infant Islanders must decide if they are willing to answer Japan's own pleas for help.

name: Passchendaele
summary_text: The lives of a troubled veteran, his nurse girlfriend and a naive boy intersect first in Alberta and then in Belgium during the bloody World War I battle of Passchendaele.

name: Force of Nature
summary_text: A gang of thieves plan a heist during a hurricane and encounter trouble when a cop tries to force everyone in the building to evacuate.

name: Wicked Little Things
summary_text: Karen, Sarah, and Emma Tunney are all moving to a small town in Pennsylvania where, unknown to them, in 1913, a horrid mine accident trapped dozens of children alive, underground. But there's a problem. They're still alive.

name: Anchors Aweigh
summary_text: A pair of sailors on leave try to help a movie extra become a singing star.

name: The Loneliness of the Long Distance Runner
summary_text: A juvenile offender at a tough reform school impresses its Governor with his running ability and is encouraged to compete in an upcoming race, but faces ridicule from his peers.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Movie - Pyramid of Light
summary_text: Underneath the sands of Egypt, Anubis, an ancient evil spirit, has awakened. It's up to Yugi, who defeated Anubis centuries ago, to use his skill and determination to rid the world of evil once again.

name: Porky's Revenge
summary_text: As graduation nears for the class of 1955 at Angel Beach High, the gang once again faces off against their old enemy, Porky, who wants them to throw the school's championship basketball game because he's betting on the opposing team.

name: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
summary_text: A high school girl falls for a playboy artist, with screwball results.

name: At Middleton
summary_text: Two parents fall in love over the course of a single day while playing hooky from their children's college tour.

name: Wake Wood
summary_text: The parents of a girl who was killed by a savage dog are granted the opportunity to spend three days with their deceased daughter.

name: The Calling
summary_text: Detective Hazel Micallef hasn't had much to worry about in the sleepy town of Fort Dundas until a string of gruesome murders in the surrounding countryside brings her face to face with a serial killer driven by a higher calling.

name: After Last Season
summary_text: Two neurology students create a telepathy experiment together to visualize a murderer, who recently knifed another student.

name: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
summary_text: After his principal (Andy Daly) destroys his sketchbook, Rafe (Griffin Gluck) and his best friend Leo (Thomas Barbusca) decide to "destroy his book" and break every rule in the school's Code of Conduct.

name: Patema Inverted
summary_text: A young girl, from a civilization that resides in deep underground tunnels, finds herself trapped in an inverted world and teams up with a resident to escape and return home.

name: She's So Lovely
summary_text: After being released from a psychiatric institution, a man tries to redeem himself in the eyes of his now-ex wife from the events that led up to his incarceration.

name: The Dinner
summary_text: Two sets of wealthy parents meet for dinner to decide what to do about a crime their sons have committed.

name: Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan
summary_text: The road to achieving a happy ending is a little too rough for two guys Kartik and Aman. While Aman's family tries hard to battle his love for Kartik, Kartik isn't prepared to step back until he marries Aman.

name: The Last American Virgin
summary_text: Pizza delivery boy Gary, loudmouth David and hunky Rick are three high students out to lose their virginity any way they can. Gary falls for transfer student Karen, who gets involved with Rick.

name: Picnic
summary_text: Emotions are ignited amongst the complacent townsfolk when a handsome drifter arrives in a small Kansas community on the morning of the Labour Day picnic.

name: The Princess Switch: Switched Again
summary_text: When Duchess Margaret unexpectedly inherits the throne to Montenaro and hits a rough patch with Kevin, it's up to her double Stacy to save the day before a new lookalike, party girl Fiona foils their plans.

name: Shanghai Express
summary_text: A notorious woman rides a train through a dangerous situation with a British captain she loved.

name: The Yakuza
summary_text: American private-eye Harry Kilmer returns to Japan to rescue a friend's kidnapped daughter from the clutches of the Yakuza.

name: Main Tera Hero
summary_text: Seenu and Sunaina fall in love with each other when he saves her from a corrupt policeman who wishes to marry her. Meanwhile, Ayesha, a girl Seenu meets on a train journey, wants to marry him.

name: After Sex
summary_text: Vignettes about eight different couples at varying points in their relationships, each having conversations immediately after having sex.

name: All Quiet on the Western Front
summary_text: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

name: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold
summary_text: The girls of St. Trinians are on the hunt for buried treasure after discovering headmistress Miss Fritton is related to a famous pirate.

name: Chandni Chowk to China
summary_text: An action-comedy about a simple cook from Chandni Chowk mistaken for the reincarnation of an ancient peasant warrior Liu Shengh by residents of an oppressed Chinese village.

name: Class of Nuke 'Em High
summary_text: The pupils at a high school next to a nuclear power plant start acting and looking strange after buying contaminated drugs from a plant worker.

name: Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man
summary_text: The resurrected Wolf Man, seeking a cure for his malady, enlists the aid of a mad scientist, who claims he will not only rid the Wolf Man of his nocturnal metamorphosis, but also revive the frozen body of Frankenstein's inhuman creation.

name: In the Mix
summary_text: A successful DJ manages to rescue a powerful mobster one night. In order to repay him, the mobster gives him the task of protecting his daughter.

name: Paris When It Sizzles
summary_text: The sprightly young assistant of a Hollywood screenwriter helps him over his writer's block by acting out his fantasies of possible plots.

name: Haunt
summary_text: An introvert teen befriends his new neighbor, and together the couple begin to explore the haunted house that his family has just purchased.
